update party_exam
exam_name = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
radio_num = #{radioNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

saq_score = #{saqScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pass_score = #{passScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_makeup = #{isMakeup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update party_exam set exam_name = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_time = #{examTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, radio_num = #{radioNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, radio_score = #{radioScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_num = #{checkNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_score = #{checkScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, judge_num = #{judgeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, judge_score = #{judgeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fill_num = #{fillNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fill_score = #{fillScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saq_num = #{saqNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saq_score = #{saqScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pass_score = #{passScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_makeup = #{isMakeup,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
